Events that occurred on 10 April

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends a medical board examination. He is found to be fit for general service.
1943 - Musician Bo Hansson is born.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 208.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a a letter to Mrs Mroczkowska.
1991 – The Revised Edition of Karen Wynn Fonstad's The Atlas of Middle-earth is published.
2018 - HarperCollins announce that The Fall of Gondolin will be published on 30 August 2018.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Eorl the Young and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
